meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #2057.

td.p: Hugh Murphy, a bank officer from Get back to this, Delaware
Marilyn Kneeland, a retired teacher from San Diego, California
Will Herrera, a retired airline pilot originally from Pueblo, Colorado

tr.td: STATE CAPITALS
MOVIE NOSTALGIA
FOOD
CHAINS
(Alex: Get it?)
RODENTS
FRENCH
